title: A Dependable Friend
detail_text: <:th_ch0007/>Hmm.... I wonder if we’re going to make it in time or not~? What I have done are....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Nozomi-san....!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Eh? What is it, Ruby-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Move your hand, not your mouth!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Eeh!? W-, what’s wrong....? You’re making a scary face....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>You want to give these handmade brooches to everyone in μ’s as a present, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Y-, yeah....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Then it’s fine! We may be running late from our plan, but Ruby is helping you, so we’ll definitely make it in time!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>You’re so dependable, Ruby-chan.... Yes, you’re right, there’s still time!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>That’s the spirit. We may be rushing, but we’re still doing it with feeling and care! Let’s do our best~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
